system.description: Character uses X (Intelligence or Perception) when rolling for initiative instead of their Agility value, and rolls two dice for the roll, choosing the highest of the two. X may be either Intelligence or Perception, with the requirements matching the characteristic.
system.benefit: Character uses X (Intelligence or Perception) when rolling for initiative instead of their Agility value, and rolls two dice for the roll, choosing the highest of the two.
system.notes: Choose Intelligence or Perception when taking this talent

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Initiative (Intelligence or Perception)
specialAbilities.description: When rolling for initiative, you use your chosen characteristic (Intelligence or Perception) instead of Agility. Additionally, you roll two dice and choose the highest result.
